mainContent.title: Diverse Sri Lankan Wildlife
mainContent.paragraph: Sri Lanka is a renowned destination for its diverse ecosystems and rich biodiversity...

sections.title: Endemic Species
sections.text: Sri Lanka boasts a remarkable array of endemic species, making it a biodiversity hotspot...

sections.title: Conservation Challenges and Initiatives
sections.text: Despite its incredible biodiversity, Sri Lanka faces numerous conservation challenges...

sections.title: Marine Biodiversity
sections.text: The coastal waters surrounding Sri Lanka are teeming with diverse marine life...
